clause_text: Mrs. Baker
the resident cat lady
adopted at least twenty cats
Mrs. Baker, the resident cat lady, adopted at least twenty cats.
Mrs. Baker's grandson tried to befriend the narrator.
The narrator, a tomboy, did not take to him due to his poor manners.
